--- title: Backend keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "SAX Backends" description: "SAX Backends" nb_path: "nbs/07_backends.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

circuit_backends

{% raw %} 
circuit_backends = {
    "default": evaluate_circuit,
    "klu": evaluate_circuit_klu,
    "additive": evaluate_circuit_additive,
}
{% endraw %}

SAX allows to easily interchange the backend of a circuit. A SAX backend needs to have the following signature:

{% raw %}

evaluate_circuit[source]

evaluate_circuit(instances:Dict[str, SType], connections:Dict[str, str], ports:Dict[str, str])->SDict

{% endraw %}

i.e. it takes a dictionary of instance names pointing to STypes (usually SDicts), a connection dictionary and an (output) ports dictionary. Internally it must construct the output SType (usually output SDict).

Example

Let's create an MZI SDict using the default backend's evaluate_circuit:

{% raw %} 
wg_sdict: SDict = {
    ("in0", "out0"): 0.5 + 0.86603j,
    ("out0", "in0"): 0.5 + 0.86603j,
}

τ, κ = 0.5 ** 0.5, 1j * 0.5 ** 0.5
dc_sdense: SDense = (
    jnp.array([[0, 0, τ, κ], 
               [0, 0, κ, τ], 
               [τ, κ, 0, 0], 
               [κ, τ, 0, 0]]),
    {"in0": 0, "in1": 1, "out0": 2, "out1": 3},
)

mzi_sdict: SDict = evaluate_circuit(
    instances={
        "dc1": dc_sdense,
        "wg": wg_sdict,
        "dc2": dc_sdense,
    },
    connections={
        "dc1,out0": "wg,in0",
        "wg,out0": "dc2,in0",
        "dc1,out1": "dc2,in1",
    },
    ports={
        "in0": "dc1,in0",
        "in1": "dc1,in1",
        "out0": "dc2,out0",
        "out1": "dc2,out1",
    }
)

mzi_sdict

{('in0', 'in0'): 0j,
 ('in0', 'in1'): 0j,
 ('in1', 'in0'): 0j,
 ('in1', 'in1'): 0j,
 ('out0', 'out0'): 0j,
 ('out0', 'out1'): 0j,
 ('out1', 'out0'): 0j,
 ('out1', 'out1'): 0j,
 ('in1', 'out1'): 0.25-0.43301j,
 ('in1', 'out0'): -0.43301+0.75j,
 ('in0', 'out1'): -0.43301+0.75j,
 ('in0', 'out0'): -0.25+0.43301j,
 ('out1', 'in1'): 0.25-0.43301j,
 ('out1', 'in0'): -0.43301+0.75j,
 ('out0', 'in1'): -0.43301+0.75j,
 ('out0', 'in0'): -0.25+0.43301j}
{% endraw %}
